definition: flower/earlobe/fig. item on both sides/classifier for flowers, clouds etc

sentences.english: Spring has also come on the wild flowers under the fence and on a small apple tree.
sentences.chinese: 也來到籬下的小花和蘋果樹枝頭的骨朵。

sentences.english: Cut the flower buds down and transplant them to bottles that with water.
sentences.chinese: 把花骨朵剪下來插到裝有水的瓶子裏開放。

sentences.english: Little fruit tree wake and send forth many flower in the tree.
sentences.chinese: 小小果樹醒來了，長出一樹花骨朵。

sentences.english: Counting the number of counts, inadvertently, I found a lot of Hua Guduo children.
sentences.chinese: 數着數着，不經意間，我發現了許多的花骨朵兒。

sentences.english: About the last of September the buds will start.
sentences.chinese: 九月末就開始打花骨朵了。

sentences.english: Came to the spring bud huaguduo.
sentences.chinese: 春天來到了含苞欲放的花骨朵上。

sentences.english: No, you can't come in, " the little Rosebud said."
sentences.chinese: “不，你不能進來，”小玫瑰花骨朵說。

sentences.english: They're just starting to bloom their tiny delicate blooms right now.
sentences.chinese: 現在，那些小小的精巧的花骨朵已經開始冒了出來。

definition: style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
crowded/framework for silkworms/gather foliage/bunch/classifier for bunched objects
to blossom/see 著花|着花[zhao2 hua1]
to blossom/to come to flower/to be in bloom
